text: Shi Bailin (1927 â€“ 31 December 2022) was a Chinese musician from Mengcheng County. He was composer of Huangmei opera. He was director of the Chinese Musicians' Association. Shi Bailin died in on 31 December 2022, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:20th-century composers Category:Chinese composers Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Place of death missing
title: Shi Bailin
